ValidationRule.description: A response's score cannot exceed the question's value
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Response_1_Score__c/100 > Score_Value__c || Response_2_Score__c/100 > Score_Value__c || Response_3_Score__c/100 > Score_Value__c || Response_4_Score__c/100 > Score_Value__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A response's score cannot exceed the question's value
